title: Rito pls

embed.description: Album with topic of Gaming uploaded by Aikuala. Rito pls ; - ;

body:
Rito Im 6 RP away from getting Red Riding Annie and its also on a sale. Pls help Rito  ; - ; {{champion:32}}
(Also this is made in paint)

replies.body: All of my feels with this drawing!  We'd like to help!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) with your specific request.  We'll see what we can do!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/O1nTGOTb-someone-is-on-my-account-right-now pls read I need your help
